languages.text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Судя по началу нашего разговора, вы придерживаетесь весьма... интересной точки зрения на деяния {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}". {n}Кунрад лукаво улыбается, глядя вам в глаза.{/n} "Вы — человек удивительных талантов, раз до сих пор сохранили свой сан, {name}. Или же само провидение благоволит к вам".

traits.locale_text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Судя по началу нашего разговора, вы придерживаетесь весьма... интересной точки зрения на деяния Адептус Министорум". {n}Кунрад лукаво улыбается, глядя вам в глаза.{/n} "Вы — человек удивительных талантов, раз до сих пор сохранили свой сан, {name}. Или же само провидение благоволит к вам".

languages.text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, Ваше Преосвященство. Судя по началу нашего разговора, вы придерживаетесь весьма... интересной точки зрения на деяния {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}". {n}Кунрад лукаво улыбается, глядя вам в глаза.{/n} "Вы — человек удивительных талантов, раз до сих пор сохранили свой сан, {name}. Или же само провидение благоволит к вам".

traits.locale_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent for having been able to retain your lank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

"My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

languages.text: “向您致意，尊敬的阁下。从我们之前的对话来看，您对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的事务有着……相当有趣的看法。”{n}维特威尔露出了狡黠的笑容，凝视着你的眼睛。{/n}“{name}，您能在这样的高位上呆这么久，这说明您拥有着非同寻常的才能。或许，这本身就是命运对您的青睐。”
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，尊敬的阁下。从我们之前的对话来看，您对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的事务有着……相当有趣的看法。”{n}维特威尔露出了狡黠的笑容，凝视着你的眼睛。{/n}“{name}，您能在这样的高位上呆这么久，这说明您拥有着非同寻常的才能。或许，这本身就是命运对您的青睐。”

languages.text: «Saludos, su reverencia. A juzgar por el comienzo de nuestra conversación, tiene una... opinión interesante sobre las obras del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}». {n}Voigtvir te dedica una sonrisa astuta mientras te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Usted, {name}, tiene que contar con un talento extraordinario para haberse mantenido en su puesto durante todo este tiempo. O tal vez la misma providencia l{mf|e|a} haya favorecido».
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, su reverencia. A juzgar por el comienzo de nuestra conversación, tiene una... opinión interesante sobre las obras del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}». {n}Voigtvir te dedica una sonrisa astuta mientras te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Usted, {name}, tiene que contar con un talento extraordinario para haberse mantenido en su puesto durante todo este tiempo. O tal vez la misma providencia l{mf|e|a} haya favorecido».

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、尊師様。私たちの会話のはじめから判断すると、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の行為についてかなり…興味深い見解をお持ちですね」{n}ボイトヴィルはあなたの目を見つめながらいたずらっぽく微笑んだ。{/n}「{name}さん、これほど長くその地位を維持できるとは、並外れた才能の持ち主でしょう。あるいは、神の意志があなたに助力したのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします、殿下。私たちの話し合いのはじめから判断すると、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の行為についてかなり…興味深い見解をお持ちですね」{n}ボイドヴィルはあなたの目を見つめながらいたずらっぽく微笑んだ。{/n} 「{name}、これほど長くその地位を維持できるとは、並外れた才能の持ち主です。あるいは、神の意志があなたに助力したのかもしれません」

「よろしくお願いします、尊師様。私たちの会話のはじめから判断すると、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の行為についてかなり…興味深い見解をお持ちですね」{n}ボイトヴィルはあなたの目を見つめながらいたずらっぽく微笑んだ。{/n}「{name}さん、これほど長くその地位を維持できるとは、並外れた才能の持ち主でしょう。あるいは、神の意志があなたに助力したのかもしれません」

languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the Adeptus Ministorum." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, , are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

languages.text: « Mes hommages, Votre Révérence. Si j'en crois les premiers mots que nous avons échangés, vous avez une opinion... intéressante sur les agissements de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}. » {n}Voigtvir se fend d'un sourire entendu en vous regardant droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Vous devez avoir un talent extraordinaire pour avoir conservé si longtemps votre rang, {name}. Ou peut-être la providence elle-même vous a-t-elle accordé ses faveurs. »
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, Votre Révérence. Si j'en crois les premiers mots que nous avons échangés, vous avez une opinion... intéressante sur les agissements de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}. » {n}Voigtvir se fend d'un sourire entendu en vous regardant droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Vous devez avoir un talent extraordinaire pour avoir conservé si longtemps votre rang, {name}. Ou peut-être la providence elle-même vous a-t-elle accordé ses faveurs. »

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, Hochwürden. Dem Beginn unseres Gesprächs nach zu urteilen habt Ihr recht ... interessante Ansichten über das Wirken des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir lächelt verschlagen und sieht dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ihr, {name}, seid ein Individuum von außergewöhnlichen Talenten, da Ihr Euren Rang derart lange bewahrt habt. Oder vielleicht steht Ihr auch in der Gunst der Vorsehung."
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, Hochwürden. Dem Beginn unseres Gesprächs nach zu urteilen habt Ihr recht ... interessante Ansichten über das Wirken des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir lächelt verschlagen und sieht dir direkt in die Augen.{/n} "Ihr, {name}, seid ein Individuum von außergewöhnlichen Talenten, da Ihr Euren Rang derart lange bewahrt habt. Oder vielleicht steht Ihr auch in der Gunst der Vorsehung."

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım hürmetli Başdiyakoz. Sohbetimizin başlarında dediklerinize bakılırsa {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum'un{/g} eylemleri hususunda epey... Enteresan bir bakış açısına sahipsiniz." {n}Voigtvir, gözlerinin içine bakıp sinsice gülümsüyor.{/n} "Makamınızı bunca zaman koruduğunuza göre fevkalade hünerli birisiniz {name}... Ya da belki takdiriilahi sizi kayırmıştır."
languages.original_text: "My regards, Your Reverence. Judging by the beginning of our conversation, you have rather... interesting views on the deeds of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}." {n}Voigtvir smiles slyly, looking you in the eye.{/n} "You, {name}, are an individual of extraordinary talent, to have retained your rank this long. Or perhaps providence itself has shown you favour."

traits.locale_text: "Saygılarımı sunarım hürmetli Başdiyakoz. Sohbetimizin başlarında dediklerinize bakılırsa {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}'un eylemleri hususunda epey... Enteresan bir bakış açısına sahipsiniz." {n}Voigtvir, gözlerinin içine bakıp sinsice gülümsüyor.{/n} "Makamınızı bunca zaman koruduğunuza göre fevkalade hünerli birisiniz... Ya da belki takdirilahi sizi kayırmıştır."
